resources:
Wizard\'s Wake Cancle Confirm Do you want to exit the game? Easy Normal Hard Very easy, Dementor is exhausted, Harry is full of energy! Harry and the Dementors are equally powerful. Very hungry soul keeper will have double normal movement speed. Start the game Highest score : Spell Manual "A Guide to Defeating " To prepare for the Dementors, Harry needs to cast a Protection Charm to avoid them. Wizards reading this, please support Harry. 1) Press the button on the bottom left to help Harry move. 2) Press the button on the bottom right to help Harry cast a spell. 3) When the Dementors fly past Harry, Harry will receive a Soul Poison. 4) Harry can only receive Soul Poison 3 times. When all 3 of Harry\'s hearts are white, Harry will immediately become soulless. 5) Wizards can keep statistics on their contributions to Harry\'s fight. The highest statistic can be seen at the top right corner of the screen. Harry and the wizards fought their hearts out. score : Back to preparing for battle All right! Change language Thai language English language Choose language
